sentences.en: ...a reproof that she responded to right away.
sentences.cn: ...她立即作出回应的责备言论。

sentences.en: " I will take anything, " he said, relieved, and wincing under reproof.
sentences.cn: “ 我什么事都愿意做, " 他说, 松了一口气, 缩着头等着挨骂.

sentences.en: His words were a mixture of pity and reproof.
sentences.cn: 他的话里既有同情也有责备。

sentences.en: She greeted me with a look of cold reproof.
sentences.cn: 她对我报以冷淡、责备的目光。

sentences.en: She raised her eyebrows in reproof.
Ted was leaning back, smoking a cigarette without reproof.
sentences.cn: 特德往后靠着, 抽着香烟,也不受到责备.

sentences.en: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.
sentences.cn: 11天的柱子,因他的斥责,震动惊奇.

sentences.en: The warmth of her smile belied the reproof.
sentences.cn: 她亲切的笑容表明她的斥责并非真的.

sentences.en: They spoke in tones of gentle reproof.
sentences.cn: 他们的语气中稍带责备。

sentences.en: This particular reproof irritated him more than any other.
sentences.cn: 这一指责是他最不能容忍的.

sentences.en: To my surprise the Gold King took the reproof with equanimity.
sentences.cn: 我真没料到,黄金大王竟然老老实实地接受了这个训斥.

sentences.en: Tom swept up the broken glass without a word of reproof to his son.
sentences.cn: 汤姆把碎玻璃扫乾净,没说一句责备儿子的话.

sentences.en: Whoever loves correction loves knowledge, But he who hates reproof is stupid.
sentences.cn: 1喜爱管教的,就是喜爱知识; 恨恶责备的,却是愚蠢.

sentences.en: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.
sentences.cn: 1喜爱管教的,就是喜爱知识.恨恶责备的,却是畜类.

sentences.en: You can scarcely expect to escape reproof for such irresponsible behavior.
sentences.cn: 你这种不负责任的行为很难期望逃脱指责.

sentences.en: You can scarcely expect to escape reproof for such irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 由于这样的不负责任,你绝不能期望去逃避责备.

trans.tran_en: If you say or do something in reproof, you say or do it to show that you disapprove of what someone has done or said
